actions.name: Celestial Blessing
actions.description: Effect: While affected by Misty Terrain is active, user gains two Ticks of HP at the end of each of their Activations.

actions.name: Celestial Blessing (Adjacency)
actions.description: Effect: If a space within range possesses Misty Terrain, the user is affected by Misty Terrain.

system.description: Effect: While affected by Misty Terrain is active, user gains two Ticks of HP at the end of each of their Activations. If a space within range possesses Misty Terrain, the user is affected by Misty Terrain.
